comments.body: Can you add some docs here?  Maybe you can add some external references to upstream AWS Eventbridge docs (java or plain docs) about `concurrency`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@ * @param concurrency maps to parallelism in in async stream operations
 * */
final class EventBridgePublishSettings private (val concurrency: Int) {
  require(concurrency > 0)
